body.name: WiFi Router Cover,Smart High Protection Router Cover, Versatile Shielding WiFi Guard(14IN x 15.5IN)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 29 mins
features: [FOR OUR HEALTH] The radiation emitted by the router seriously endangers our health.Prolonged exposure to it with high frequencies may cause headache, loss of memory, sleep disturbance and more. There are many studies that link the radiation to a host of other sicknesses and neurological problems. So We need radiation shielding bags to protect our families from harmful radiation.

[QUALITY MATERIALS] The radiation shielding wifi cover is made by Copper/ Nickel/Polyester Fiber which is certified to provide 99.999%protecting across the frequency range of 10KHz to 3GHz and still over 99.6% effectiveness at 5.6GHz. This fabric has good conductivity and shielding effect.

[PAY ATTENTION]:The WIFI router radiation cover is made of high-quality copper-nickel material. When exposed to air for a long time, it will naturally oxidize, and the surface color will appear spots and turn black.It will not affect its function and shielding efficiency, it just shows the authenticity and high quality of the material.

[BIG SIZE] The router cover measures 14” x 16”,suitable for both Wifi routers with or without antenna and for most types of routers in the markets.Our protective bags have Velcro at the seal. You are able to better enclose your router. we suggest wrap the entire router when you are sleeping or outside. Please note, the cover is not advised to wash

[GOOD SERVICE] If you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, simply return it to Amazon within 30 days for a full money-back refund. And any questions about the product, just send us email and we will spare no efforts to solve it.
body.description: Merit Blocks up to 90% of RF radiation: It works like a Faraday box, does not affect the network speed of the router, and can effectively block up to 90% of RF radiation Simple installation: Just put the router in the protective cover, put the wires and network cables through the black plastic round holes, and then cover it, the whole house is protected

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why we need to choose a Router Cover? Currently most WiFi routers on the market use the 2.40 GHz, 5 GHz and (if it is a 5G router) 60 GHz frequencies. There are many studies that link the radiation to a host of other sicknesses and neurological problems. We think we are keeping our children safe and we do not realize how much danger we are putting them in by exposing them to all of these electromagnetic toxins. The Wi-Fi Router Cover is proven to block about 95% of electromagnetic field (EMF) and radio frequency (RF) radiation emitted by routers all day long. The EMF blocker works like a Faraday fabric or cage to effectively shield the router and highly reduce the intensity of radiation it emits in a given space.

1: Test when no wifi cover protection, the reading is 0.68 2: With wifi cover protection when covering the router cover, the reading is obviously reduced to 0.08, please note: the protection only works when covering the router antenna. 3: Fixing the Velcros The reading has been 0 when closing the velcros, the shiedling effect has been most. when you want the best protection, you could close the velcros.

Good compatibility: The router cover size is 14*16 inch, which is compatible with most routers Merit Blocks up to 90% of RF radiation: It works like a Faraday box, does not affect the network speed of the router, and can effectively block up to 90% of RF radiation Simple installation: Just put the router in the protective cover, put the wires and network cables through the black plastic round holes, and then cover it, the whole house is protected
ACTUAL TEST It turns out that the Wi-Fi router cover can block most of the electromagnetic field (EMF) and radio frequency (RF) radiation emitted by the router throughout the day.
ACTUAL TEST It turns out that the Wi-Fi router cover can block most of the electromagnetic field (EMF) and radio frequency (RF) radiation emitted by the router throughout the day.

Special Faraday Fabric and Special Design This faraday fabric is hard net style 1. It is much durable and firm 2. It is thicker and more tangible 3. precision sewing and closing design with 3 velcros, you could close the cover easier
Could also use it as a faraday bag, not only protect from wifi route, but also ipad, mobile phones and other devices you want.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reduces EM radiation
reviews.reviewText: I bought this "Faraday cage" to reduce the electromagnetic radiation coming off of my wireless gateway. If you meter the amount of radiation before and after installing the cage it works and reduces radiation. Also, I didn't notice any difference in the strength of my wireless signal while using the cage. A must-have for anyone concerned about EM radiation's effects on the human body.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It was used and I paid for a new one!
reviews.reviewText: When I received it the package was already opened and jagged and I could see it was refolded in a different way than it had originally been. Pretty sleazy business practice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Eliminates Some EMF
reviews.reviewText: I was hoping it would eliminate more. The numbers only went down about 10 points. It doesnt seem to affect the Wifi signal which Im glad about. I suppose some protection is better than none. Perhaps as EMF becomes more prevalent, protection against it will get better too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Multi use product. Works great!
reviews.reviewText: Stylish bag is made of silver fibers and blocks all EMF signals from going through my head.However, it's made for my Wi-Fi antennae's, but it makes my ears stop ringing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THIS ITEM WORKS!
reviews.reviewText: I am so impressed & shocked at the amount emitted by our wireless router and blocked by this cover. It has no effect on the signal at all. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Almost Too Good
reviews.reviewText: I tested it using a proper meter and it works well, but it does reduce the strength of my Wi-Fi signal. I am keeping it and my family safe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Tested good with my TriField EMF meter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The video speaks for itself
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Witness EMF reading actually rises when you place the cover over the modem. Thumbs down!
